title: Workshop on Inquiry-Based Digital Learning Design Tool Development

context.prior_knowledge: Core principles of instructional design, subject matter expertise in social studies, digital tool utilization experience
context.additional_context: Pre-service teachers collaboratively design actual lesson plans, combined with exploring and improving digital tool functionalities through asynchronous interaction in an online environment

learning_goals: Learners can collect and analyze data for inquiry-based lesson design using digital tools.
Learners can collaboratively establish lesson improvement plans using digital tools with fellow teachers.
Learners can develop customized instructional design strategies that integrate subject content (social studies) with technical skills.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
